document_title: Corneal ulcers: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
To prevent or limit the risk of keratitis, especially for people who regularly wear contact lenses, you should:
Replace contact lenses on time; Do not expose yourself to direct sunlight by wearing eye protection when going out; Do not sleep while wearing contact lenses; Contact lenses should be removed when swimming; Before wearing or removing contact lenses, wash your hands thoroughly; Use glass cleaning solution, do not replace it with water or dilute the solution; Treatment to stabilize the underlying disease
subsection_title: viem loet giac mac.json. Prevention of corneal ulcers
